title: Ravens v Steelers, Jaguars v Colts and Bills v Bengals: NFL week 14 – live
summary: Graham Searles will provide live updates on tonight's NFL games, featuring the Ravens' matchup against the Steelers at M&T Bank Stadium. Fans can expect real-time coverage and insights throughout the game. Stay tuned for exciting highlights and key plays.

title: The War Between the Land and the Sea review – prepare to roll your eyes a lot at this fishy Doctor Who spinoff
summary: Russell T Davies's new show about fishfolk is entertaining but suffers from problematic character names and a lack of subtlety. The portrayal of female roles raises concerns about depth and representation. Overall, it feels like a missed chance to create truly exceptional television.

title: Anthony Albanese warns of ‘difficult’ bushfire season ahead as almost 40 homes lost in NSW and Tasmania
summary: Disaster payments have been announced following the destruction of 16 homes in Koolewong and four in Bulahdelah, New South Wales. Additionally, 19 homes were reported lost in Tasmania. The financial assistance aims to support those affected by these recent disasters.

title: Strictly Come Dancing: week 11 results – as it happened
summary: Musicals Week kicked off with a new Dance Relay and concluded with Paddington's first appearance in the ballroom. The competition heated up as couples prepared for the penultimate dance-off. Participants faced the risk of elimination before the semi-finals.
